bibl.title: The Pattern of Royal Epithets on Hellenistic Coinages.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The catalogue. - General comments [pp. 422-423: First phase. An Egyptian process (c. 270-198)]. - Bibliography. - Table 1: List of royal hellenistic epithets on coinage (in geographical and chronological order); - Table 2: Alphabetical index of royal epithets on coins (arranged in chronological order); - Table 3: First monetary appearance of royal epithets (arranged in chronological order); - Table 4: Classification of hellenistic royal epithets on coins; - Table 5: Frequency index of royal epithets on the coinage of hellenistic kingdoms.

bibl.title: More than Men, Less than Gods. Studies on Royal Cult and Imperial Worship. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007)

bibl.seg: de Callataÿ François and Catharine C. Lorber, The Pattern of Royal Epithets on Hellenistic Coinages.

Panagiotis P. Iossif, Andrzej S. Chankowski and Catharine C. Lorber (Edd.), More than Men, Less than Gods. Studies on Royal Cult and Imperial Worship. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007) = Studia Hellenistica. 51 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., 2011) pp. 417-455, 5 tabl.

Introduction. - The catalogue. - General comments [pp. 422-423: First phase. An Egyptian process (c. 270-198)]. - Bibliography. - Table 1: List of royal hellenistic epithets on coinage (in geographical and chronological order); - Table 2: Alphabetical index of royal epithets on coins (arranged in chronological order); - Table 3: First monetary appearance of royal epithets (arranged in chronological order); - Table 4: Classification of hellenistic royal epithets on coins; - Table 5: Frequency index of royal epithets on the coinage of hellenistic kingdoms.
